name: whois_exists
description: query the whois database if a domain name exists

domain_name.description: Name of the domain name to query. The input name must look like a proper domain name

name: generate_text
description: function that asks an LLM to generate some sort of text

prompt.description: the prompt for the large languge model

name: write_file
description: function to write a file to the local disk

file_name.description: the full path of the file to write

file_data.description: the data of the file to write. the file_data has to be encoded using base64
